channel.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
channel.description:
[code]src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1362: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.startAnimation(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][2]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1363: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.gfx100(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][3]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1366: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context addSkillXP(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][7] * Config.M AGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1386: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.startAnimation(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][2]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1387: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.gfx100(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][3]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1390: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context addSkillXP(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][7] * Config.M AGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); ^ Note: src\rs2\world\map\I.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How in the world do I fix this?

item.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

How come it still doesn’t work? The actual process of enchanting. Like when I use the spell on a sapphire ring with the saphire enchantment, it won’t do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

remove Player.

from infront of MAGIC_SPELLS

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

How would I work my way around it?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
item.dc:creator: @Wank Broham
item.description:
@Wank wrote:

You can’t reference non-static variables from a static method.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help with non-static errors!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1362: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.startAnimation(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][2]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1363: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.gfx100(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][3]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1366: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context addSkillXP(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][7] * Config.M AGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1386: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.startAnimation(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][2]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1387: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context c.gfx100(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][3]); ^ src\rs2\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1390: error: non-static variable MAGI C_SPELLS cannot be referenced from a static context addSkillXP(Player.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][7] * Config.M AGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); ^ Note: src\rs2\world\map\I.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

How in the world do I fix this?
